description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e9am4","text":"High molecular weight DNA has become a necessary resource with the advancement of long-read sequencing from Nanopore ONT and PacBio SMRT. Often times excessive treatment with phenol-chloroform and prolonged periods of centrifugation results in sheared DNA below 10 kilobases. DNA extracted from viruses is notably less stable than that of cellular organisms, and is often heavily sheared upon extraction. Likewise, kits designed specifically for viral DNA extraction tend to return very low yields of DNA. This protocol seeks to subvert the shearing of typical DNA extractions by combining the process with pulsed-field gel electrophoresis while also maintaining high yields.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"asiad","text":"Low melting agarose gels are extremely fragile and take a long time to cast. Casting and moving the gel inside a 4° C walk-in refrigerator can ease the process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Nucleocytoviricota, virus, DNA extraction, high molecular weight, long-read sequencing

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"brus3","text":"Infect   of Aureococcus anophagefferens CCMP1984 with   of Aureococcus anophagefferens Virus (AaV) lysate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":12,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ogcc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"90C4E770959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"9CB8E6D0959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c4cna","text":"Incubate cultures at 19 degrees C on a 14:10 light-dark cycle until complete lysis of the culture (~10 days).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5bh6","text":"Concentrate the lysed culture to a final volume of 50 – 100 mL final volume via tangential flow filtration using a 30 kDa filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":76,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"701v4","text":"Centrifuge concentrated lysate for   at 3,500 xg at 4° C to pellet cellular organisms in lysate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bistn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"BEB77260959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bsrql","text":"Remove supernatant and discard pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"38ugu","text":"Add 10% Triton-X to supernatant to a final concentration of 1%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9dm48","text":"Centrifuge 50 mL lysate at a speed of 24,000 xG  at 4° C for   to pellet viruses. Discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6j2ti","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":4500,"guid":"B95C71D0959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fe7oc","text":"Resuspend the pelleted viruses in a   of 50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 10 mM MgCl2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6ajti","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"AD08C640959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2fhe","text":"Add   DNAse I (2.0 mg/mL) and mix gently.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"flsov","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9","error":false,"guid":"B10F5A60959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gkqr","text":"Incubate at room temperature for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3434v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"B4513EF0959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a4ok","text":"Add   of 500 mM EDTA (pH 8.0). Mix gently.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7gfph","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"CC86E880959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"efkqi","text":"While incubating, prepare   2% molecular grade agarose solution by microwaving agarose/water mixture . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"970qo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"C8B3E780959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"acq1j","text":"Add 2% agarose solution to concentrated lysate at a 1:1 ratio for a final concentration of 1% agarose. Store in water bath until ready to cast.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ngco","text":"Cast agarose—lysate mixture in BioRad CHEF Mapper Plug Molds (Catalog No. 1703713) and allow to solidify at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"34i","text":"Prepare viral lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cer19","text":"After agarose has solidified punch out of molds and add two per Eppendorf tube with   lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5loho","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"DE239340959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"69mo3","text":"Add proteinase-K to a final concentration of 1 mg/ml to each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bpj96","text":"Incubate over night at 37° C under gentle rotation (~ 2-3 xG or 100 rpm) in a shaking incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"567r9","text":"Cast a 2% low-melting agarose gel and allow at least   for gel to solidify.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"doqr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"E6531090959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d5tpi","text":"Decant lysis buffer from overnight incubations of plugs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vnjt","text":"Prepare TNE wash buffer (10 mM Tris-Base, 200 mM NaCL, 0.5 mM EDTA). Filter sterilize through a 0.22 µM syringe filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bhvpu","text":"Wash with   TNE buffer by resuspending and shaking at room temperature for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ai6tb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"ED3107A0959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"EFC6CDB0959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"18ni9","text":"Pour off TNE buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"77g5s","text":"Repeat steps 22-23 once.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fttpr","text":"Carefully insert plugs into individual wells of the low melting agarose gel using a sterile razor blade or pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cvvvr","text":"Seal the wells by pouring liquid 2% agarose over the wells and allow poured agarose to solidify.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a29ov","text":"Run gel at approximately 120 V for   to  or until a high molecular weight band of DNA can be visualized.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6q6fb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"F7228040959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"FFC3AB20959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dcf23","text":"Excise high molecular weight bands from the agarose under UV light, being careful to remove as little excess agarose as possible. Place excised pieces of gel in Eppendorf tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"k9nq","text":"Melt agarose in a water bath set to 80° C Bring volume in tube up to   with MilliQ water. The melted agarose volume should never exceed 500 µL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b836k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"064B6BE0959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gud1","text":"Once entirely melted (after at least ten minutes), add  basic phenol to the tube and invert to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7l6a7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"095C0740959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"da027","text":" Place phenol—agarose mixture at -80° C for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"35ahj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"0D898450959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"frg2p","text":"Centrifuge the mixture for   at maximum speed on a microcentrifuge at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"289me","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"221538B0959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"929pu","text":"Carefully remove upper aqueous layer and place in a clean   Eppendorf tube. Discard the lower phenol layer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ogsn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"26E389A0959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ru1e","text":"Add   phenol and   chloroform to the aqueous layer. Centrifuge at max speed for   at room temperature. Pipette aqueous layer into a new 2 mL Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e6kvk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"2A2CE840959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"2C6EE900959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"2ED78490959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebobs","text":"Repeat step 33-34  until there is no remaining protein debris between the aqueous and the phenol layer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ev7hk","text":"Add   chloroform to the aqueous layer. Centrifuge at full speed for  . Pipette aqueous layer into a clean 2 mL Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"68ueu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"359681F0959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"3865F5A0959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fvt1q","text":"Repeat step 36 once.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4l2q0","text":"Precipitate the DNA by adding 3 M sodium acetate to a final concentration of 0.1 M (~67 µL in 2 mL) and fill to   with 100% EtOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":112,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3eu37","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"3F105990959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fktp6","text":"Precipitate DNA at -80℃ for at least   or overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6rd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"45CFA510959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5beog","text":"Centrifuge samples at maximum speed at 4° C for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b72e2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"4FE60AD0959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvoaj","text":"Remove supernatant and resuspend DNA pellet in   70% EtOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"380tv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"58638110959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5gf0h","text":"Centrifuge samples at maximum speed at 4° C for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"es1h5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"5B6B1BC0959311EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ik4l","text":"Remove supernatant. Allow residual EtOH to evaporate on a heat block set to 37° C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"509lo","text":"Resuspend DNA pellet in MilliQ water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6sba9","text":"Do not allow to solidify: hold in a water bath set to 50° C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43inh","text":"Add   20% SDS, 500 µL 0.5 M EDTA, and 200 µL 3 M sodium acetate to a conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7du6q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"750","error":false,"guid":"D3EF1E30959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"35kpv","text":"Bring to   with MilliQ water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"apf2i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"D82E9CA0959211EC9FFC0B02A8CF12EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5htg6","text":"Filter sterilize through a 0.22 µM syringe filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1udp9","text":"If phenol-agarose has frozen, allow sample to thaw before centrifugation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1g91b","text":"Quantify extracted DNA on Nanodrop or Qubit per manufacturer’s specifications before sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
